text.div:
Narrativa gerada: NamingSystem RegulatoryPolicyNamingSystem

Resumo

Definição de URLhttps://2rdoc.pt/ig/ios-lifestyle-medicine/NamingSystem/RegulatoryPolicyNamingSystem
Versão0.1.0
NomeRegulatoryPolicyURN
Estadoactive
Definição

URN namespace for healthcare regulatory framework policy references. These URNs provide stable identifiers for regulatory policies that may have changing URLs.

EditorRicardo Lourenço dos Santos

Identificadores

TipoValorPreferenciaisComentário
URIurn:eu:gdpr:2016:679trueEU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - Regulation 2016/679
URIurn:us:hipaa:privacyfalseUS Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act - Privacy Rule
URIurn:us:hipaa:securityfalseUS Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act - Security Rule
URIurn:br:lgpd:2018falseBrazilian General Data Protection Law (LGPD) - Lei 13.709/2018
URIurn:ca:pipeda:2000falseCanadian Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act
URIurn:eu:ehds:2022falseEuropean Health Data Space Regulation

name: RegulatoryPolicyURN
responsible: iOS Lifestyle Medicine HEADS FHIR IG
description: URN namespace for healthcare regulatory framework policy references. These URNs provide stable identifiers for regulatory policies that may have changing URLs.
usage: Use these URNs in Consent.policy.uri to reference specific regulatory frameworks. The URN format is: urn:{region}:{regulation}:{year}[:{section}]
